cells.data:
-- takeWhileGen :: (a -> Bool) -> Gen [a] -> [a]
on takeWhileGen(p, xs)
    set ys to {}
    set v to |λ|() of xs
    tell mReturn(p)
        repeat while (|λ|(v))
            set end of ys to v
            set v to xs's |λ|()
        end repeat
    end tell
    return ys
end takeWhileGen
